website_summaries.verdict: The LG G5 for AT&T is a powerful smartphone with a semi-modular build, making it a unique alternative to more typical flagship handsets. But heavy software changes won't please Android purists.
pros: Wide-angle camera mode and manual controls
cons: Heavy software customization with some key Android features disabled

customer_reviews.title: ... used it for a few days it's a very good phone. I'm a light user and I get ...
customer_reviews.text: It took a few weeks to arrive but now I've used it for a few days it's a very good phone. I'm a light user and I get about three days without having to charge it. The phone is very quick and lag free and the display clear and bright even in bright sunshine. There is plenty of memory for apps etc. and it took a 64 gbyte memory card without any complaints. All in all an excellent phone especially for the price as it's comparable to a Samsung S7 - apparently.
customer_reviews.author: The Shrink

customer_reviews.title: Happy with phone
customer_reviews.text: Arrived when I was told it would. Looked perfect until I removed a small code sticker to find it covering a nick in the seal on the metal part of the phone. Can live with it as it is minor but disappointed. Other than that phone works well, screen is clear, photos are great. Enjoying using it.
customer_reviews.author: Nix

customer_reviews.title: Worked for only 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 6 months fine and then stopped working entirely when charging one night. Was completely bricked and wouldn't reboot for over a week. Eventually got it to power up and it is stuck in a boot loader setup. Unable to reboot it to the main operating system. I would not recommend buying this as it is a gamble it will never turn on again.
customer_reviews.author: Aaran

customer_reviews.title: Awful LG service
customer_reviews.text: Phone with specifications is very good like Processor, ram and screen quality. Most negative thing with phone is battery quality and service from LG mobile, when I gave on guarantee with antenna signal issue. After month they sent me back phone without any proof of test phone from service. Just I got information, there is nothing to fix and works fine. Phone still has problem with signal.
customer_reviews.author: Lukasz

customer_reviews.title: It had hidden dodgy features
customer_reviews.text: At first i thought it was a great product especially being second hand, it came as a surprise the quality looking barely used, but after a day of use a few features became clear to not be fully functional, such as the volume button was going on and off, the screen keeps bugging out and is sometimes unresponsive, the phone even turns off completely when it reaches 15%, and if I'm honest i cant blame the company for these issues as they would be hard to spot, but as a warning to others be careful of what you order, this is only from personal experience and may not affect all their products.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander-Wells

customer_reviews.title: the power button stops working after a little while, ...
customer_reviews.text: the power button stops working after a little while, making the phone close to unusable.spent 80£ to fix it only to have it break on me two weeks later
customer_reviews.author: Jens Tallaksen

customer_reviews.title: Great mobile phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone, it has a removable battery, a camera module that makes taking photos just a little bit easier and there is a VR add-on for it too
customer_reviews.author: LtPessimist

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone and customer service is amazing, thank you for your help.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: ... but now I'm finding the back light bleed very annoying and it has issues connecting to WiFi at
customer_reviews.text: Overall a decent phone but now I'm finding the back light bleed very annoying and it has issues connecting to WiFi at times
customer_reviews.author: Jess D

customer_reviews.title: when can the problem be solved?
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed, look at the state I received. I want the problem to be solved
customer_reviews.author: Tulbure Ionut Romeo

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone.
customer_reviews.text: G4 died. And this was £150 cheaper than on the high street. No brainer, really. It's a nice phone for me. Actually, really didn't have a choice, there are no other newer phones with removable storage and battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the wide angle lens. Battery life an issue - buy a battery pack
customer_reviews.author: Mr John S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A geat phone with outstanding camera and good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Janis

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, just the batery life lets it down
customer_reviews.text: Great looking phone, excellent software and UI and an impressive camera. The only thing that is letting it down is the battery life. On an average usage day it will just about last till the night time.
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Great phone (and doesn't explode)
customer_reviews.text: Lovely phone, just popped my sim in and I was away. Easy to use and navigate, was my first android phone after having iphones for a while, and couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Tiisler

customer_reviews.title: Fully functional
customer_reviews.text: I received the Phone and it's fully functional. The model I've received it's the European version, but it's made in Israel.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmin Dicu

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the product was not sealed, therefore could have been tampered with. I suspect a battery swap
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Hong Kong model but not UK model delivered
customer_reviews.text: it was telling UK model (H850) but in fact the delivered item was Hong Kong model (H860). It may be useful for certain users but is not I expected as the product title is saying 'LG G5 UK SIM Free' which is different from what was delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Jingu Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not a UK version
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone LG H-860 but not a UK version so no warranty from LG and only one month from supplier
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Fingerprint reader works whole lot better than my tablet. Phone is light and runs everything smoothly. Haven't tried any modules yet, but looking forward to doing so. I also like the fact it's not got a heavy manufacturer default skin
customer_reviews.author: Mark Shurms

customer_reviews.title: A+ phone
customer_reviews.text: What can i say . I'm typing my review on it . The phone is as described and i love it. ( it's very underrated) i definitely recommend it before any other phone.
customer_reviews.author: Marius Popa

customer_reviews.title: Not Amazon's fault
customer_reviews.text: This phone screen is so fragile you would not believe. LG Australia offered FREE glass replacement it's that bad. Don't buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: ... as a warehouse deal and it is a truly great phone. I just hope it lasts
customer_reviews.text: got this as a warehouse deal and it is a truly great phone. I just hope it lasts. It feels very delicate so I recommend a case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Phone
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing product blown away by the build quality and software and the fact you can charge it fully in about an hour is incredible, on top of superb camera quality and build, especially the ultra wide camera for those that want to take awesome looking photos.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Colverson

customer_reviews.title: Honestly The Best Phone On The Market!
customer_reviews.text: I had the G3 and upgraded to the G5. This phone is truly amazing and is easily the best phone of 2016! Never used a better phone, and trust me, I've used a lot in my time. This phone is absolute brilliance and I highly recommend this if you're looking for a new phone that can last you a long time and won't become outdated! 5 Stars
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Galloway

customer_reviews.title: A much improved camera that will sit alongside the so called big boys
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the LG G5 a few weeks and am impressed with the speed of it as well as the camera, which apart from using Word, is my main usage for a mobile phone. I am still getting used to it as it is somewhat different to the old LG G2 I had. It works well in Wi-Fi mode and even using the Data function when there is no Wi-Fi available it is pretty impressive. I like the wide angle camera on the back, which is great for landscapes and the video recorder produces very good results.. The call quality is good and the speaker is plenty loud enough.
customer_reviews.author: Ps Kavanagh

customer_reviews.title: Great improvement on G4 and very happy with it .
customer_reviews.text: Cannot find any faults as yet with it and very pleased . Definitely an upgrade on sound by Bluetooth to my van's audio over G4 and that is without any add-on from B&O . Probably the Samsung better looking phone but that is why it is so much more expensive than LG . Not a phone tech but it does what I want it for very well .
customer_reviews.author: Ray C

customer_reviews.title: I want to return
customer_reviews.text: This phone was scratched without a box without a charger, nor did it bring earphones.furthermore it was used for another person I think it's a bad buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AVOID LIKE THE PLAGUE....GOOGLE LG G5 GPS FAIL
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for a few months.....and then the GPS chip fails......rendering any location based apps useless....no Google maps...no nav..... absolute piece of crap....do not buy this phone ! Google this known fault....LG have seemingly done nothing to resolve it.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsum Fantastic

customer_reviews.title: lg issues like every phone they make
customer_reviews.text: LG once again have shoddy build quality leading to yet another bootloop issue. Will not be buying LG again. Ever. I refuse to pay a high price for low quality
customer_reviews.author: Ricky.

customer_reviews.title: Camera is much worse than G4 and G3 models
customer_reviews.text: Removable battery is hard to remove and place back. Battery dies within 2 hours, Camera is much worse than G4 and G3 models. Go for G4 - its still better.
customer_reviews.author: Vision

customer_reviews.title: Proabably the worst phone I have ever owned...
customer_reviews.text: Probably the worst phone I have ever owned, screen is back lit meaning if watching something like netflix you can tree the back light around the edge of the phone, the USB C cable falls out of the phone at the slightest touch, I'd wake up in the morning with the cable having fallen out in the night
customer_reviews.author: TheGuyWhoLikesPurple

customer_reviews.title: Everything I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I am not a smartphone expert, so I won't be commenting on the G5 in much detail. I really like it, it is very quick and the cameras are amazing, with the second, ultrawideangle, camera and the ability to take photos in auto, semi-automatic and manual modes as well as JPEG and RAW. Compass and changeable battery were also high on my list. The refurbished phone came in perfect condition with the operating system flawlessly working. Screen looked pristine and battery life seems amazing, too. Just nothing to fault here!
customer_reviews.author: JensR

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, just a little more battery please LG.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, really fast, charges quickly. I've never used the friends functionality, might get a second battery at some stage as battery depletes quite quickly if screen turned up. Camera is brilliant and I love side angle facility. Plus very well priced. If LG released a bigger battery in same format it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: dh

customer_reviews.title: Not new
customer_reviews.text: Phone works fine. However, it appears not to be a new phone. It has another number in it, and clearly was a Vodaphone previously with an app that will not delete. Also has no wi-fi calling option. Apart from that, works ok
customer_reviews.author: tanky

customer_reviews.title: Great handset - very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: An excellent handset bought to replace my ageing battered Galaxy S4. Advertised as refurbished so came unboxed and with just the usb cable. There wasn't a mark on it - it was like new. Very happy with the purchase. Great battery life and performance. One thing, which is not an issue for me but I thought I'd mention in case people were wondering, wireless charging is NOT supported since it has an aluminium body. It does have NFC though which works fine despite this.
customer_reviews.author: John1v6

customer_reviews.title: You'll never buy another iPhone after using this!
customer_reviews.text: Love it - super cool phone. The camera are superb, and the bundled LG Fitness app is surprisingly good. I just wish I could stop "downloads" showing in the photo gallery.
customer_reviews.author: Claudette

customer_reviews.title: Annoyed
customer_reviews.text: Fingerprint recognition fail after 2 weeks and nothing fixes it. Annoying for a new phone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: this as an awesome phone and a total bargain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Not the British model even though it says 'UK' in the title
customer_reviews.text: Phone is fine, but from India, which is not made explicit in the purchasing blurb. LG here say they will not honour the warranty as they don't keep the parts in stock. AFAICT it is exactly the same as the British version though, just a different model number [860 not 850]
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a few weeks, quick android phone, v happy
customer_reviews.author: P. R. Carne

customer_reviews.title: would have paid more it is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful phone. fabulous net. perfect. so glad I chose LG again.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Charlton

customer_reviews.title: Best Phone of 2016
customer_reviews.text: Would buy again. Fantastic product. I waited for it to drop in price (it was never worth more than £400). Build issues were definitely a problem with some of the earlier models and there was definitely some bad 'uns but the European batches seem to be holding their ground. Not a very popular device and probably not the best looking but certainly the best spec for a phone from a decent manufacturer. The always on display and wide angle lens being my favourite. As the battery can also be replaced it should definitely hold its resale value too.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew1471!

customer_reviews.title: Oh look, it's dual SIM
customer_reviews.text: Despite purchasing what was listed as a UK device through Amazon UK and purchasing a 'Fulfilled by Amazon' item the G5 that has arrived is the international version which poses some questions about warranty in the UK. However, as the international version is dual SIM, which I wasn't expecting but is something I'm considering as a bit of a bonus, I'm not unhappy. When I get my head around Marshmallow, I may add an actual review of the 'phone.
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: NOT VALUE FOR MONEY. Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This phone has major problems charging and only after 8 months use it now will not charge at all. I have returned it under warranty to be told it has no problems with charging! When I received it back the same problem exists. I have purchased different charging cables including the recommended one and still no luck! I would not recommend this phone. It is not a low cost phone and it is not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: innovative phone 2016
customer_reviews.text: i think this is the innovation of 2016 flagship phone. none of others are. swappable battery, ultra wide angle lens, modular design, there is no other phone that can fulfill these functions in one piece.
customer_reviews.author: han shuo

customer_reviews.title: Phone in great condition, seems like new
customer_reviews.text: Phone in great condition, seems like new. Works perfectly and a great upgrade to my HTC One M7. Very good value for money, in my opinion and very prompt after sales service. Will likely use again for my next upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: groovydad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great phone with great specifications!! I recomend this if you want a top phone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone.
customer_reviews.text: Great smartphone. Fantastic sound once the B&O DAC is added.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Hills

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. But be warned camera lens glass is ...
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. But be warned camera lens glass is very weak. Mine was randomnly shattered in my pocket. I googled it and alot of people have had similar issue. Amazon have ignored my complaint about it for over a day now. Brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the phone. I hope this one does not give up in six months as the G4 did. But that is the protection of buying from Amazon, great customer service. Battery is good, found no difference to my other 3000mah phones. It takes getting used to the smaller screen. Fingerprint is very conveniently located. Build is good, I have not noticed any issues. Wide angle camera so innovative. Battery off course removable. Speaker very good. Micro SD slot. Takes a nano SIM. Original charger cable very flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Samsung s6 edge I had.
customer_reviews.text: This phone look like the pictures shown. It has many features, one of which is using this phone as a TV remote etc. One of many features. The phone's aesthetics are pretty beautiful: it's slim and stylish. The phone is also very light and easy to handle. The only downside of this product is that you need a spare battery, but that's nothing. Unless you're on a budget and need extra batteries. Also the dual cameras hand out very pixilated images, but with the right hand can producs stunning images in 4k. In short I would recommend this phone over the lg g4 or samsung s6 and edge. It's faster, louder and the overall image quality is superb. Thunbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: Poor cheap build and display, but worst of all received a dual SIM Arabic Middle East variant instead of the UK version, as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: MR STEVEN TOTH

product_meta.title: LG G5 32 GB UK SIM-Free Smartphone - Titan Grey
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:GreyThe full metal unibody with a slide out battery and eye catching modular design is made complete with a collection of companion devices called LG Friends offering true expandability with enhanced hardware experiences that will re-ignite your mobile pleasure and reshape the way you interact with a smartphone. With a wide angle lens at 135 degrees and the always-on display, the LG G5 is sure to fuel your passion for play and fun.

BOX CONTAINS
1 x G5 Sim Free Android
feature_bullets: Enhanced metal design, uninterrupted and without any lines to compromise the full metals sleek finish
First of its kind, full metal unibody device with slide-out, removable battery
The camera grabs even more with its 135 degree ultra wide angle lens
With the always-on display, your essential information is always available without having to wake up the screen

specifications.Customer reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
